member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets a connection string.

member.summary: Override. Returns the result of an attempt to execute a Data Generation plan.
member.returns: Returns True if execution is successful; otherwise, False.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether to purge tables before population.

member.summary: Gets or sets the input data generator file.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether this task is set to verbose.
